mapper.insert: insert into base_organization_user_role ( organization_user_id, organization_role_id, `status`) values ( #{organizationUserId}, #{organizationRoleId}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, organization_user_id organizationUserId, organization_role_id organizationRoleId, `status` FROM base_organization_user_role WHERE organization_user_id = #{organizationUserId} and organization_role_id = #{organizationRoleId}
SELECT id, organization_user_id organizationUserId, organization_role_id organizationRoleId, `status` FROM base_organization_user_role WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT bor.id organizationRoleId, bor.organization_id organizationId, bor.system_module_id systemModuleId, bour.id organizationUserRoleId, bour.organization_user_id organizationUserId, boRole.id operationalRoleId, boRole.`code` operationalRoleCode, boRole.`name` operationalRoleName, boRole.remark, boRole.create_date createDate, IF( bour.id IS NULL, FALSE, TRUE )isChoose FROM base_organization_role bor LEFT JOIN base_organization_user_role bour ON bour.organization_role_id = bor.id AND bour.`status` = 0 AND bour.organization_user_id = #{organizationUserId} LEFT JOIN base_operational_role boRole ON boRole.id = bor.operational_role_id AND boRole.is_used =TRUE WHERE bor.organization_id = #{organizationId} AND bor.system_module_id = #{moduleId} AND bor.`status` = 0
